DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective clinical study collect clinical data support FDA 510 ( k ) submission Topcon CT-800 , CT-1 , CT-1P TRK-2P non-contact tonometer . The secondary objective evaluate adverse event find clinical study .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Study Non-contact Tonometers Intraocular Pressure Corneal Cell Thickness Measurements
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age either sex race ethnicity ; Willing able provide write informed consent prior study procedure perform ; Willing able follow instruction attend study visit ; Best Spectacle Corrected Visual Acuity ( BSCVA ) 0.3 logMAR ( 20/40 Snellen equivalent ) good eye measure use ETDRS chart . Only one functional eye ; Poor eccentric fixation ; Corneal scar corneal surgery , include corneal laser surgery ; Microphthalmos ; Buphthalmos ; Contact lens wearer , mean worn soft contact lens within past 3 month and/or rigid permeable gas lens within past 6 month ; Dry eye , mean diagnosis physician dry eye currently use prescribe medication ; Lid squeezer blepharospasm ; Nystagmus ; Keratoconus ; Any corneal conjunctival pathology infection ; Condition situation , Investigator 's opinion , may put subject increase risk , confound study data , interfere significantly subject 's study participation .
